blogs.title: Bad Things
blogs.body: things are not so bad after all, for here are creatures who are even afraid of us
blogs.author: Rubby

blogs.title: The Hares and the Frogs
blogs.body: Hares, as you know, are very timid. The least shadow, sends them scurrying in fright to a hiding place. Once they decided to die rather than live in such misery.
blogs.author: Leo

blogs.title: Debate
blogs.body: But while they were debating how best to meet death, they thought they heard a noise and in a flash were scampering off to the warren. On the way they passed a pond where a family of Frogs was sitting among the reeds on the bank
blogs.author: Leo
